Character.name: Character
Character.description: A newly summoned mage into a new world with a fascination for arcane arts.

Location.name: New World
Location.description: A mystical world filled with magic and wonder.

Location.name: Scholar's Study
Location.description: A place of learning and knowledge.

Event.name: New World Discovery
Event.description: Character discovers they have been summoned to a new world and begins to imagine their character in detail.

Event.name: Character Creation
Event.description: Character chooses their class (Mage), race (Elf), profession (Scholar), appearance, and other defining attributes.

Event.name: School of Magic Selection
Event.description: Character selects their school of magic (Enchantment) and elemental affinities (Water and Air).

Event.name: Most Used Spells Chosen
Event.description: Character identifies their most used spells (Mind Whisper, Mirror Maze, Veil of Mist).

Event.name: Visual Representation Defined
Event.description: Character describes their visual representation, including their appearance, surroundings, and the runes on their cloak.
